Package serverside.server

Class ServerMethod

  • java.lang.Object
    • serverside.server.ServerMethod
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, Server
    public class ServerMethod
extends java.lang.Object
implements Server, java.lang.Runnable
    The server class for the Pentago game! This class is responsible for the server that will be started to host other clients to play the pentago game!

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ServerMethod​(java.net.ServerSocket ss)
      This is the constructor for the server which creates a new server and has a port it should start at as a parameter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addClient​(ClientHandler c, int number)
      Used to add a clientHandler object to the server!
      java.util.List<ClientHandler> getClientHandlers()
      Used to access the list of clients stored in the server.
      GameHandler getGameHandler()
      Used to return the gameHandler object which handles a game of Pentago being played on the server.
      java.lang.String[] getSupportedExtensions()
      This returns a String array with all the supported extensions that the server is able to do when communicating with the client.
      void removeClient​(ClientHandler c)
      Used to remove a clientHandler object to the server!
      void run()
      Used to create a new clientHandler object everytime a client connects to the server.
      void start()
      The start method of the server which starts the server on it's port which would have been specified in this class's constructor when creating a new ServerMethod object.
      void stop()
      Used to stop the server and close the serverSocket.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Used to stop the server and close the serverSocket. Also removes all the clients connected to this server.
        Specified by:
